budget_title: Office of the Secretary of Defense
explanation: Funds are required to resource microelectronics research maturation development and workforce development initiatives.

budget_title:
DEFENSE-WIDE DECREASE

Creating Helpful Incentives to Produce Semi-Conductors (CHIPS)
explanation: Section 102(b)(1) of the CHIPS Act of 2022 requires that the $400 million appropriated by section 102(b)(2)(A)(i) of that Act for FY 2024 for the CHIPS for America Defense Fund be transferred to accounts within the Department of Defense.
